news.title: NSBE 2026 Annual Convention - March 18-22, 2026
news.content: Join over 16,000 attendees in Baltimore for #NSBE2026: Advancing S.T.E.M. Registration opens in October! Experience workshops, career fair, networking, and professional development at the Baltimore Convention Center.

news.title: NSBE Region VI Regional Conference - Nov 21-23, 2025
